content: embark shawlette created by rebecca becky dahlberg i splurged on one skein of woolfolk tov it was so deliciously squishy and round in the skein that i knew i wanted to do something delightful with it i love big eyelets i cannot lie… and i love how eyelets knit up in this aran weight yarn if you are ready to embark on a journey of big eyelets and big squishy yarn come along and knit this asymmetrical boomerang shawlette materials dimensions yarn aran weight sample used woolfolk length 50 inches 127 cm tov 100% wool 158m/173y per 100g depth 9 inches 23 cm skein in t06 ocean 1 skein yardage ~173 yards sample used all but 2 gauge yards stockinette knit flat 14 stitches x 27 row = needle size us 10/6 0 mm 24-inch or 4 inches 10 cm longer circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle © rebecca dahlberg 2018 embark shawlette pattern repeat garter section 68 set up if you are worried about yardage you can cast on 3 stitches using long tail cast on skip to the border section or throw in a row 1 ws k all lifeline which is never really a bad idea row 2 rs k1 yo k2tog row 3 ws sl1 kfb k1 4 eyelet section 4 row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog stockinette section row 2 ws sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog row 3 k1 yo k3 k2tog yo x 2 ssk row 2 ws sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 k4 x 7 k2tog yo x 2 ssk k3 k2tog repeat row 1 & 2 forty-five more times row 4 sl1 p4 k1 p7 x 7 k1 p5 kfb 50 k1 70 garter section repeat garter section 73 row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog worried about yardage you can bind off at row 2 ws sl1 k to last 2 sts kfb k1 the end of this section repeat row 1 & 2 two more times 53 border eyelet section 1 the stitch count remains at 73 in this row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog section row 2 ws sl1 p to last 2 sts kfb k1 row 1 rs k2tog yo x 2 ssk x 18 k1 row 3 k1 yo k9 k2tog yo x 2 ssk row 2 ws sl1 p1 k1 p3 x 17 k1 p2 k4 x 5 k2 k2tog row 4 sl1 p7 k1 p7 x 5 p4 kfb k1 55 bind off use lace bind off or your preferred elastic bind off repeat garter section 58 knit 2 stitches then insert the left needle into the front of the 2 stitches on the right eyelet section 2 needle and k2togtbl knit another stitch row 1 rs k1 yo k to last 2 sts k2tog k2togtbl the 2 stitches
